name: THE LABS
description:
THE LABS

You are part of The Labs.

You have been in the The Labs for a very long time...

Everyday Y7, the Artificial Intelligence in charge of your testing, wipes your memory. They are running tests on you because you have a gift - you can control electrical currents with you mind. 

In the tests you control the lighting in your current lab to manoeuvre your way through platforming puzzles.
